doc:
Jimmy Durante https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jimmy_Durante 0 James Francis Durante (February 10, 1893 – January 29, 1980) was an American singer, pianist, comedian, and actor. His distinctive clipped gravelly speech, Lower East Side Manhattan accent, comic language-butchery, jazz-influenced songs, and prominent nose helped make him one of America's most familiar and popular personalities of the 1920s through the 1970s. He often referred to his nose as the schnozzola (from the Yiddish slang word "schnoz" [big nose]), and the word became his nickname. James_Francis_Durante ( February_10_,_1893 – January_29_,_1980 ) was an_American_singer , pianist , comedian , and actor . His_distinctive_clipped_gravelly_speech , Lower_East_Side_Manhattan_accent , comic_language-butchery , jazz-influenced_songs , and prominent_nose helped_make him one of America 's_most_familiar_and_popular_personalities of the_1920s through the_1970s . He often referred to his_nose as the_schnozzola ( from the_Yiddish_slang_word_"_schnoz " [_big_nose_]_) , and the_word became his_nickname .
